did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.
did.abstract: The collection includes receipts and more than 100 pieces of incoming and outgoing correspondence relating to M. L. Foley's business selling birds out of Salem, Virginia.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from M. L. Foley Collection must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: M. L. Foley Collection, Ms2012-031, Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The collection was purchased by Special Collections in May 2012.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement, and description of the M. L. Foley Collection was completed in June 2012.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection includes receipts and more than 100 pieces of incoming and outgoing correspondence relating to M. L. Foley's business selling birds out of Salem, Virginia. Foley's letters concern the breeding, sale, and shipment of birds throughout the U.S., as well as Central and South America. The collection also contains receipts for birds, freight, feed, licenses, and more.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection is arranged by material type. Within each material type (correspondence and receipts), items are arranged chronologically with undated items at the end.
